about_the_game:
Eyes of Iyre is a Visual Novel with heavy RPG elements. Follow Barbak the Orc as he discovers more about the world and his past, all the while trying to keep his temper under control. Make friends, cast magic, and learn the truths hidden in the city of Iyre!

Key Features:
  • .5 hours of gameplay
  • Multiple save slots
  • Multiple minigames
  • Tons of detailed character designs
  • Interactive Maps and Backgrounds
  • All-new soundtrack and sound design
  • Made using Renpy VN engine

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

name: Eyes of Iyre Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
